Name: Sweet Canary Melon
SeedDescription: Plant these in spring. Takes 11 days to mature, and keeps producing after the first harvest.

SeedNameLocalization.ja: カナリアメロンのタネ

SeedDescriptionLocalization.es: Plántalas en primavera. Toma 11 días para madurar, continua produciendo después de la primera cosecha.
SeedDescriptionLocalization.ko: 봄 작물. 성장하려면 11일이 소요되며, 수확한 후에도 계속 생산됩니다.
SeedDescriptionLocalization.de: Pflanzen sie im Frühling. Wächst in 11 Tagen heran, kann aber danach mehrmals geerntet werden.
SeedDescriptionLocalization.ja: 春植えの作物。そだつのに11日かかるが、そのあともくりかえし収穫できる。
SeedDescriptionLocalization.pt: Plante-as na primavera. Demora 11 dias para amadurecer e continua produzindo após a primeira colheita.
SeedDescriptionLocalization.zh: 春天播种。11天成熟，收获之后还能继续结果。
